entry.title: Identities.
entry.summary:
Author: Feathered_Stag

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,023Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 388

Summary: All of the Justice League members know each other's identities, aside from Batman- but no one knows that Superman knows Batman's identity. Because of their hidden personal lives and the secret relationship between Batman and Superman, some drama ensues. It's pretty hilarious to Batman, though from Superman's point of view, it's stressful how much the other League members are misunderstanding the situation... The Batfam is also pretty involved in this... not to mention they ALSO don't know about Bruce's and Clark's relationship. There will be some smut.Also my bad if there are any continuity errors ✋

entry.title: tying me to you
entry.summary:
Author: Areiton

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,448Chapters: 17/24Kudos: 80

Summary: It was a gauntlet, getting here, and now that he is--now that there is nothing to do but watch the vows being said and the Families reacting, now he can second guess himself. It's done. Right or wrong, the decision is made. Peter has a husband, bound to him by magic and blood and, in a few minutes, law. He takes a deep breath and for the first time in a very long time, he considers praying.

entry.title: Into Our Lines
entry.summary:
Author: RosaMinnieLot099

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,110Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 8

Summary: Batman, at the beginning of his career as a vigilante, meets another vigilante, or rather, THE hero. After all, with his charming smile and his alien powers, Superman is almost like a deity, a deity that Bruce Wayne finds quite unpleasant and suspects the alien has plans to dominate the earth, in addition he had a horrible secret identity, people from Metropoles were probably blind. Superman visits Gotham and there finds a guardian as dark as the city. After moving to Metrópolis, Clark becomes a journalist on the daily planet and, together with his co-worker Lois Lane, begins to investigate a series of suspicious transactions that take place from the ports of Gotham to Metropolis. Realizing that dangerous weapons are being transported, Clark uses his secret identity to go to the source of the crime where he has his first encounter with Gotham's bat.

entry.title: A Ghost Guide To Taking Over Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: ThatStupidOne

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,046Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 42

Summary: Jack and Janet Drake died six years, three months, and fifteen days ago. Their bodies had been recovered from the Gotham bay. The only question left was where was Timothy Drake's body? Or Gotham thinks Tim drowned with his parents. Little did they know that he hadn’t even been in the car that night. He built up a kingdom within Gotham for himself, but what happens when something, someone, threatens to send his empire crumbling down under his feet? How can he continue to run away from everything and save himself? When the truth starts to slip it leaves Tim stumbling to pick up the mess before anyone finds out.

entry.title: open up my eager eyes
entry.summary:
Author: snapdragonsuplex

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,657Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 380

Summary: “There you are.” Clark blinks, then turns around to see a woman standing in the doorway, backlit by the gala. She’s tall, probably nearly as tall as Bruce, with medium-tone skin and long, dark hair that falls in soft waves down to her mid-back. She’s wearing a long-sleeved black dress and a set of perfect pearls. Her dark red lips are pulled up in a smirk, and her dark green eyes are set right on Bruce. The expression on her face is… Clark doesn’t know why, but he doesn’t like it. “You’re a hard man to find, Mr. Wayne,” she says with the slightest hint of an accent that Clark can’t quite place. “Miss al Ghul,” Bruce replies. “I didn’t know you were in town.” ------------------------------In the midst of an attack by the League of Assassins, Clark tries to grapple with some new information about Bruce.

entry.summary:
Author: grouchy_gremlin

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,729Chapters: 2/15Kudos: 23

Summary: Clark Kent is Kal-el, the last son of Krypton: a solar mage who was adopted by the Kent family, a pair of simple peasants from the village of Smallville. To make his ma’s signature pumpkin pie she needs a special kind of thyme, that is only found in Gotham kingdom. Clark, who knows that Gotham’s Dark Knight forbids mages from stepping foot in his kingdom, goes there despite the risks. Will he manage to hide his magic? Will somebody discover his true identity and turn him in, or will the fearsome Dark Knight find him first?

entry.title: Here’s to the Fools Who Dream.
entry.summary:
Author: fzanchikk

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,111Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 11

Summary: The door closes behind them with a soft click. In the darkness, he can barely make out Bruce's outline by the bed—can just see how he sits down, then pats the bed right next to him. A silent command. Come here. Clark hovers up to him—making himself comfortable, standing in between the other's legs. He looks down to the man as his hand cradles his jaw. The room is cast in inky shadows, save for the faint hint of moonlight through the open window and the glow of the city below. In the darkness, he can barely make out the sharp planes of Bruce's face. But he doesn't need to see him to feel him. He looks otherworldly like this. Beautiful.
